article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives Additional Funds For C-5 Modernization
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Lockheed Martin has received $344 million in ongoing funding associated with the C-5 Super Galaxy Reliability Enhancement and Re-Engining Program. The funds support low rate initial production for 15 aircraft, including installation of upgraded avionics on three aircraft, material and fabrication for five aircraft, and long-lead funding for seven aircraft.
